mapper.select: select FAQ_NO as no, FAQ_ID as id, FAQ_TITLE as title, FAQ_CONTENT as content, FAQ_CREATED_DATE as createdDate, FAQ_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate from faq where faq_id = 'CAT-01'
select FAQ_NO as no, FAQ_ID as id, FAQ_TITLE as title, FAQ_CONTENT as content, FAQ_CREATED_DATE as createdDate, FAQ_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate from faq where faq_id = 'CAT-02'
